external_games.name: Sackboy: A Big Adventure - ASTRO BOT Costume

name: Sackboy: A Big Adventure - Astro Bot Costume
summary: Icon vs icon. Game recognises game. Hero meets… you get the idea. The platinum princes of PlayStation platforming royalty finally meet as Sackboy unveils his new out-of-this-world ASTRO BOT costume. Internet connection required to access downloadable content.
